root.name: Mario Kart: Arcade GP DX
root.description: OverviewThe next Mario Kart Arcade title will incorporate a variety of game modes, including a single player Grand Prix mode, a two player cooperative mode (akin to the one found in Mario Kart: Double Dash!!) where players can team up to form a super kart with one player driving and the other controlling items, four player local competitive multiplayer and a Clone Battle mode that uses online data. The arcade machines will include a camera for taking photos of players' faces, which can then be edited with Nintendo-themed imagery, a feature that's a staple of the Mario Kart Arcade GP series. New to the series are the gliders and the underwater racing that debuted in Mario Kart 7, the previous entry in the franchise.Mario Kart: Arcade GP DX debuted at the 2013 Japan Amusement Expo which took place from the 15th of February to the 16th.
